languages.text: "Характер поломок указывает, что данная единица побывала в бою. Выдвигаю гипотезу, что она была направлена конструктором на арену. Судя по текущему ее статусу, результат боевых испытаний оказался неудовлетворителен, иначе единица была бы подвергнута ремонту".

"The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."
languages.original_text: "Характер поломок указывает, что данная единица побывала в бою. Выдвигаю гипотезу, что она была направлена конструктором на арену. Судя по текущему ее статусу, результат боевых испытаний оказался неудовлетворителен, иначе единица была бы подвергнута ремонту".

traits.locale_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that the constructor sent it into the arena. Judging by its current status, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory, otherwise the unit would have been repaired."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「損傷の性質から、このユニットが戦闘に使用されたことがわかる。コンストラクターがアリーナに送り込んだのだろう。現状からすると、戦闘テストの結果は満足のいくものではなかった。そうでなければ、ユニットは修理されたはずだ」
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: 「損傷の性質から、このユニットが戦闘に使用されたことがわかる。コンストラクターがアリーナに送り込んだのだろう。現状からすると、戦闘テストの結果は満足のいくものではなかった。そうでなければ、ユニットは修理されたはずだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这台机器的伤痕表明，它曾经参加过战斗。我猜测，应该是它的创造者把它送到了竞技场。但就它目前的状况来看，战斗实验的结果并不令人满意，否则它应该早就被修好了。”
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: “这台机器的伤痕表明，它曾经参加过战斗。我猜测，应该是它的创造者把它送到了竞技场。但就目前的状况来看，战斗实验的结果并不令人满意，否则它应该早就被修好了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La naturaleza de los daños indica que la unidad ha estado en combate. Mi hipótesis es que el constructor la envió a la arena. A juzgar por su estado actual, el resultado de las pruebas de combate no fue satisfactorio. De lo contrario, la unidad habría sido reparada».
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: «La naturaleza de los daños indica que la unidad ha estado en combate. Mi hipótesis es que el constructor la envió a la arena. A juzgar por su estado actual, el resultado de las pruebas de combate no fue satisfactorio. De lo contrario, la unidad habría sido reparada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das Schadensbild deutet darauf hin, dass die Einheit im Kampf war. Meine Hypothese wäre, der Erbauer hat sie in die Arena geschickt. Basierend auf ihrem aktuellen Zustand, war das Ergebnis der Kampftests nicht zufriedenstellend. Andernfalls wäre die Einheit repariert worden."
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schadensbild deutet darauf hin, dass die Einheit im Kampf war. Hypothese: Der Erbauer hat sie in die Arena geschickt. Ihrem aktuellen Status nach zu urteilen, war das Ergebnis der Kampftests nicht zufriedenstellend. Ansonsten wäre die Einheit repariert worden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La nature des dégâts subis indique que l'unité a participé à des combats. Hypothèse : cette machine a servi dans l'arène. À en juger par son état actuel, elle n'y a pas produit de résultats satisfaisants. Sinon, l'unité aurait été réparée. »
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: « La nature des dégâts subis indique que l'unité a participé à des combats. Hypothèse : cette machine a servi dans l'arène. À en juger par son état actuel, elle n'y a pas produit de résultats satisfaisants. Sinon, l'unité aurait été réparée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hasarın doğası, birimin çatışmada yer aldığını işaret ediyor. Hipotezime göre yaratıcısı onu arenaya göndermiş. Mevcut durumu göz önüne alındığında, çatışma testlerinin sonuçları tatmin edici olmamış. Aksi takdirde birim onarılırdı."
languages.original_text: "The nature of the damage indicates that the unit has been in combat. I hypothesise that its constructor sent it into the arena. Based on its current condition, the result of the combat tests was unsatisfactory. Otherwise, the unit would have been repaired."

traits.locale_text: "Hasarın doğası, birimin çatışmada yer aldığına işaret ediyor. Hipotezime göre yaratıcısı onu arenaya göndermiş. Mevcut durumu göz önüne alındığında, çatışma testlerinin sonuçları tatmin edici olmamış. Aksi takdirde birim onarılırdı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
